To find percentage:<br /><br />1.&nbsp; Divide the <strong>part</strong> by the <strong>whole.</strong><br /><br />2.&nbsp; Change the result to a percentage.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Next, write a math expression and do the math"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"5"},"leftText":"<p>The <strong>part</strong> is the floor space of your home office.<br /><br />The <strong>whole</strong> is the floor space of the entire home.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Yes, it does!</span></p><p><br />Your answer makes sense.<br /><br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows your home's floor plan divided into 4 equal parts.  Your whole home is 530 square feet.  Each part is about 133 square feet. The floor plan also shows your home office as 112 square feet.  This is just a little smaller than one quarter of your home.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"13"},"leftText":"<p>Now that you have the answer, you should summarize what you have found by stating it clearly, including units of measurement or symbols.<br /><br />In this case, your answer should include the percent symbol (%).<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>My new home office is about 21% of the total floor space of my home.<br /><br />I can use this percentage to determine the portion of my home expenses that can be used as a tax deduction.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"14"},"leftText":"<p>Have you ever been bumped off of a flight?<br /><br />Argo Airlines has just announced that its flights between New York and Las Vegas are already booked at more than 100% capacity for the next month.&nbsp;<br /><br />This is called <strong>over-booking;</strong> the airlines do it on purpose to make sure they have full flights!<br /><br />In this case, the value that represents the part is actually bigger than the value that represents the whole amount.&nbsp; This is why the percentage is more than 100%.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"An airplane seating chart shows the number of seats that are available, and the number of seats that have been sold.  The number of seats sold is more than the number of seats available.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","headerText":"Percentages greater than 100%"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"15"},"leftText":"<p>If an airplane has 122 seats, and the airline sold 128 tickets for a flight to Las Vegas, what percentage of its capacity has it sold for that flight?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">What you need to find:</span></p><p>The percentage of the airplane&#39;s capacity that the airline has sold<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">What you know:</span></p><p>The capacity is 122 seats.</p><p>The airline has sold tickets for 128 seats.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"16"},"leftText":"<p>You need to find the percentage of the airplane&#39;s capacity that the airline has sold.&nbsp;<br /><br />The question you need to answer is &quot;128 is what percentage of 122?&quot;<br /><br />Identify the <strong>part</strong> and the <strong>whole</strong>.&nbsp;&nbsp; In this case, the part is bigger than the whole!<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>The <strong>part</strong> = 128 seats</p><p>The <strong>whole</strong> = 122 seats</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"17"},"leftText":"<p>Write a math expression for part `-:`&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; whole.<br /><br />Divide and round to 4 decimal places.<br /><br />Then, convert to a percentage and round to a whole number.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>`&quot;part&quot;/&quot;whole&quot;` =&nbsp; `128/122`</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; = 1.0492</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; = 104.92%</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; = 105%</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"18"},"leftText":"<p>You would expect your answer to be a little more than 100% because 128 is a little bigger than 122.&nbsp;&nbsp; Your answer makes sense!&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br /><br />State it clearly.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p>The airline sold 105% of its capacity.<br />&nbsp;</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"audioPath":"19"},"leftText":"<p>When you need to find the percentage, think about what value represents the <strong>part</strong> and what value represents the <strong>whole</strong>.<br /><br />Then, divide the <strong>part</strong> by the <strong>whole</strong>, (even if the <strong>part</strong> is larger), and convert the result to a percentage.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null}],"overviewHeader":"Overview"}
